results.name: Sum_{d|n, d = 0, 1, or 6 mod 7} d.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[Sum[If[Mod[d, 7] <2 || Mod[d, 7]==6, d, 0], {d, Divisors[n]}], {n, 80}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 25 2017 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 25 2017
